sections.title: Declarations
sections.text:
Policy Number: TEST-12345
Named Insured: ABC Corporation
Policy Period: 01/01/2025 to 01/01/2026
Limits of Insurance: $1,000,000 Each Occurrence

elements.text: Policy Number: TEST-12345
elements.explanation: The element defines the term 'Policy Number' used in the policy.
elements.function: Identifies the unique identifier assigned to the insurance policy.

elements.text: Named Insured: ABC Corporation
elements.explanation: The element defines the term 'Named Insured' as ABC Corporation, specifying who is covered under the policy.
elements.function: Identifying the entity or individual that is the primary insured party under the policy.

elements.text: Policy Period: 01/01/2025 to 01/01/2026
elements.explanation: The element establishes the specific time period during which the policy is in effect, indicating the start and end dates.
elements.function: Defines the duration of coverage provided by the insurance policy.

elements.text: Limits of Insurance: $1,000,000 Each Occurrence
elements.explanation: This element specifies a specific monetary limit of $1,000,000 for each occurrence, which is a sub-limit within the broader coverage provided by the policy.
elements.function: To establish the maximum amount of coverage available for each individual occurrence of a covered loss.

sections.title: ENDORSEMENT - ADDITIONAL INSURED
sections.text:
This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following:
COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART

SCHEDULE
Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s):
XYZ Partner Company

Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

elements.text: This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART
elements.explanation: This endorsement modifies the coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part, indicating a condition that alters the scope of coverage.
elements.function: To specify the changes or modifications to the insurance coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part.

elements.text: SCHEDULE Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s): XYZ Partner Company
elements.explanation: The element specifies the addition of XYZ Partner Company as an additional insured party, extending coverage to them. (Corrected invalid type)
elements.function: To extend coverage to a specific entity beyond the named insured

elements.text: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.
elements.explanation: The element expands the coverage to include additional insured parties specified in the Schedule.
elements.function: This element specifies that certain persons or organizations listed in the Schedule are considered insured under the policy.

references.explanation: The COVERAGE_GRANT element refers to the Definitions element by mentioning the additional insured person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

sections.title: SECTION I - INSURING AGREEMENT
sections.text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of "bodily injury" or "property damage" to which this insurance applies. We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any "suit" seeking those damages. However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any "suit" seeking damages for "bodily injury" or "property damage" to which this insurance does not apply.

elements.text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.
elements.explanation: The element provides coverage for damages that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay due to bodily injury or property damage.
elements.function: To specify the scope of coverage provided by the insurance policy in terms of liability for bodily injury or property damage.

elements.text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
elements.explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insurer to defend the insured in case of a suit seeking damages.
elements.function: Specifies the insurer's obligation to provide legal defense for the insured in certain situations.

elements.text: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.
elements.explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insurer to defend the insured only for damages that fall within the scope of coverage provided by the policy.
elements.function: Establishes the conditions under which the insurer is obligated to defend the insured in legal actions related to covered damages.

sections.title: SECTION II - EXCLUSIONS
sections.text:
This insurance does not apply to:
1. Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
2. Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.

elements.text:
Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
elements.explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.
elements.function: To exclude coverage for situations where the insured intentionally causes bodily injury or property damage.

elements.text:
Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
elements.explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage arising from contractual liability assumed by the insured.
elements.function: Excludes coverage for liabilities assumed by the insured under contracts or agreements.

sections.title: SECTION III - DEFINITIONS
sections.text:
1. "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.
2. "Property damage" means:
   a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
   b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

elements.text: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.
elements.explanation: The element provides a definition for the term 'Bodily injury' used in the policy.
elements.function: To clarify and specify the scope of coverage related to bodily harm or injury to a person.

elements.text:
"Property damage" means:
a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.
elements.explanation: The element provides a definition for the term 'Property damage' used in the policy.
elements.function: To clarify the meaning of 'Property damage' for the purpose of the insurance policy.

sections.title: SECTION IV - CONDITIONS
sections.text:
1. Bankruptcy
Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.
2. Duties In The Event Of Occurrence, Offense, Claim Or Suit
a. You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an "occurrence" or an offense which may result in a claim.

elements.text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.
elements.explanation: This element establishes a requirement that the bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured will not relieve the insurer of its obligations under the policy.
elements.function: To ensure that the insurer remains obligated to fulfill the terms of the policy even in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

elements.text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

conditions: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

elements.explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insured to notify the insurer of an 'occurrence' or offense that may result in a claim, indicating a reporting obligation.
elements.function: To ensure timely reporting of potential claims to the insurer for proper handling and investigation.
